7   package org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.internal;
8   
9   import java.util.ArrayList;
10  import java.util.List;
11  
12  import org.hibernate.boot.registry.selector.SimpleStrategyRegistrationImpl;
13  import org.hibernate.boot.registry.selector.StrategyRegistration;
14  import org.hibernate.boot.registry.selector.StrategyRegistrationProvider;
15  import org.hibernate.cache.spi.RegionFactory;
16  
17  /**
18   * Makes the 2 contained region factory implementations available to the Hibernate
19   * {@link org.hibernate.boot.registry.selector.spi.StrategySelector} service.
20   *
21   * @author Steve Ebersole
22   */
23  public final class StrategyRegistrationProviderImpl implements StrategyRegistrationProvider {
24  
25  	@Override
26  	@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
27  	public Iterable<StrategyRegistration> getStrategyRegistrations() {
28  		final List<StrategyRegistration> strategyRegistrations = new ArrayList<StrategyRegistration>( 2 );
29  
30  		strategyRegistrations.add(
31  				new SimpleStrategyRegistrationImpl(
32  						RegionFactory.class,
33  						EhcacheRegionFactory.class,
34  						"ehcache",
35  						EhcacheRegionFactory.class.getName(),
36  						EhcacheRegionFactory.class.getSimpleName(),
37  						// legacy impl class name
38  						"org.hibernate.cache.EhCacheRegionFactory",
39  						"org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.EhCacheRegionFactory"
40  				)
41  		);
42  
43  		strategyRegistrations.add(
44  				new SimpleStrategyRegistrationImpl(
45  						RegionFactory.class,
46  						SingletonEhcacheRegionFactory.class,
47  						"ehcache-singleton",
48  						SingletonEhcacheRegionFactory.class.getName(),
49  						SingletonEhcacheRegionFactory.class.getSimpleName(),
50  						// legacy impl class name
51  						"org.hibernate.cache.SingletonEhCacheRegionFactory",
52  						"org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.SingletonEhCacheRegionFactory"
53  				)
54  		);
55  
56  		return strategyRegistrations;
57  	}
58  }
